Access Control

Cantaloupe supports HTTP Basic authentication. When enabled, the entire Cantaloupe website will be restricted.

To enable it, set the following keys in the configuration file:

http.auth.basic = true
http.auth.basic.username = myself
http.auth.basic.secret = password
